Class Hero

java.lang.Object
characters.Character
characters.Hero
All Implemented Interfaces:
combat.Combatant, Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Mutant, Specialist
public abstract class Hero extends Character
Represents the main playable hero character. Inherits attributes and behavior from Character, and introduces hero-specific features such as leveling, experience tracking, and luck. Heroes start at level 1, gain experience to level up, and unlock stronger stats. They also have access to a unique combat action: "Special Skill".
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • Hero

      public Hero(String name, int healthPoints, int willPoints, int strength)
      Constructs a hero with the specified attributes. Initializes the hero at level 1 with 0 experience and no luck. Adds the "Special Skill" action to the hero's action map.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the hero
      healthPoints - initial health points
      willPoints - initial will points
      strength - initial strength value

  • Method Details

    • getLevel

      public int getLevel()
      Returns the current level of the hero.
      Returns:
      the hero's level

    • getLuck

      public boolean getLuck()
      Returns whether the hero is currently lucky.
      Returns:
      true if lucky, false otherwise

    • setLuck

      public void setLuck(boolean luck)
      Sets the hero's luck status.
      Parameters:
      luck - true if lucky, false otherwise

    • gainExp

      public void gainExp(int exp)
      Grants experience points to the hero and checks for level-up eligibility. Heroes may level up multiple times if enough experience is gained.
      Parameters:
      exp - the amount of experience gained

    • printStatus

      public void printStatus()
      Prints the hero's current status to the console, including level and experience.
      Overrides:
      printStatus in class Character

    • setWeapon

      public void setWeapon(items.Weapon weapon) throws exceptions.InsufficientCharacterLevel
      Equips a weapon to the hero if their level meets the weapon's requirement.
      Specified by:
      setWeapon in interface combat.Combatant
      Overrides:
      setWeapon in class Character
      Parameters:
      weapon - the weapon to equip
      Throws:
      exceptions.InsufficientCharacterLevel - if the hero's level is too low
